column5: Hi all,  Heard a lot about aftermarket ATV snorkel kits, decided to see what all the fuss was aboutâ€¦...
Someone has too much time on their hands maybe? But that looks like a blast for sure. Hypothermia will take some of the fun out though. A dry suit may help.
Lmao! You are nuts hahaha that's hilarious
How was the water Simon what would be really cool is to see you tubing behind that Grizzly.  Cheers Mitch
Haha goofball. I'd be right there behind you doing the same thing! Looks like a blast for sure
Not sure you have that snorkel kit properly installed, but DAMN! That looked fun lol
I'd be out there too, looks like a blast haha
